_sName: Play Sound for only one Player
_sText:
Heya, so this is my first prefab
I'm using this for like ages but now I wanted to share it because I got annoyed by players who abuse songs in your map.
This is VERY awesome for discos, because if someone wants to listen to a song he can press the button and ONLY he will hear it
There are CT Spawns aswell as T Spawns, the CT spawns are for bots, because they touch a trigger which will play the sound on spawn, the T has to press a button to start his sound.
